title: Bugsplats
body: Holy shit.   While trying to complete a full repair ( which wasn't even needed I just do one every 3rd game because the client is shit). The client breaks down over and over and over filling my task bar with a stream  bugsplats as it fails to complete a simple repair check

replies.body:
If you're having to repair this often and having this many Bugsplats, there's probably something *critically wrong* with your installation of League, your system, or the drive you've installed League onto. I strongly recommend having League installed to the default directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends). Working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) is most likely to fix you issue, so I strongly recommend doing so.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
